title.narrative: BRIDGE School Partnerships Program in Indonesia

description.narrative: The Building Relationships through Inter-cultural Dialogue and Growing Engagement (BRIDGE) Program aims at building people-people links between Indonesians and Australian teachers, students and school communities by selecting Australian and Indonesian teachers to participate in an international program that focuses on improving the pedagogical practices and cross-cultural understandings amongst the participants. The program has been operational in Indonesia and implemented since 2008 by the Asia Education Foundation of the Univ of Melbourne with support from DFAT.Three main activities incl.: (1) Selection &#38;#38; pairing of participant schools and teachers (2) In-Australia Program &#38;#38; establishment of school partnerships and (3) Ongoing communication and support.The program will focus on how to maintain the existing school partnerships and establish new sustainable ones. The total value of this investment is $4.6 million to be expensed over three years, starting in the 2019-20 financial year.
